sentence: Others in attendance included Senate candidates Herschel Walker of Georgia, Eric Greitens of Missouri, as well as House candidates Morgan Ortagus of Tennessee, Harriet Hageman of Wyoming, and Max Miller of Ohio.
author: Theodore Bunker
title: Trump Hosts GOP Candidate Forum at Mar-a-Lago Resort

sentence: ), and Max Miller (Ohio), according to Punchbowl.
title: Trump holds GOP candidate forum at Mar-a-Lago

sentence: Additionally, candidates who do not yet hold public office attended, including Georgia congressional candidate Herschel Walker and Ohio congressional candidate Max Miller.
author: Summer Lane
title: Trump holds event for GOP candidates at Mar-a-Lago
